DOC.brief_summary: To investigate bioequivalence two compound ( phenytoin epamin ) randomize , single dose study fast condition healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of PHENYTOIN Suspension Made By Pfizer , Versus EPAMIN® Made By McNeil LA LLC In Healthy Volunteers Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 26.9 kg/m2 ± 10 % variation ideal weight ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
